snippet: There is sufficient evidence to try military commanders over an offensive against ethnic Karen fighters from 2005 to 2008, Harvard researchers say.
lead_paragraph: There is sufficient evidence to try military commanders over an offensive against ethnic Karen fighters from 2005 to 2008, Harvard researchers say.

headline.main: Report Cites Evidence of War Crimes in Myanmar
